meanings.definition: A body of water partially enclosed by land
meanings.sent1: The bays along the coast were calm and peaceful.
meanings.sent2: We went fishing in the bays and caught some fish.
meanings.sent3: The ducks happily swam in the bays, quacking away.
meanings.sent4: The bays sparkled under the sunlight like precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The bays reflected the colors of the sunset beautifully.

meanings.definition: A section of a building that projects outwards
meanings.sent1: The hotel room had a lovely bay with a view of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading in the cozy bay window of her room.
meanings.sent3: The cat loved to nap in the warm bay by the window.
meanings.sent4: The bay of the house provided a perfect spot for plants to thrive.
meanings.sent5: The bay added charm to the architecture of the building.

meanings.sent1: The dog bays whenever the mailman arrives.
meanings.sent2: The puppy bays excitedly when it sees its favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: The dog bays at the squirrels running around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The howling wind seemed to bay like a pack of wolves.
meanings.sent5: The hound bays in the distance, echoing through the night.
